paragraph.paragraph: Use the DB_CHANGE class to perform any operation on your database that does not require access to a result. You can for instance modify table row content, drop table rows, create and delete tables.
paragraph.note:
Note: Take a look at the
../50_data_object_coupling/index.xml#insert Data Storing capability if you want to insert table rows.
paragraph.paragraph: DB_CHANGE allows you to modify the database data using the SQL language:

list.item: Prepare your SQL query and use modify: Missing Code

Commit your changes with your session control: Missing Code
Tip: It is always better to check the database status for errors before committing changes.
